title: Scalably Enhancing the Clinical Validity of a Task Benchmark with Physician Oversight
summary: Automating the calculation of clinical risk scores offers a significant opportunity to reduce physician administrative burden and enhance patient care. The current standard for evaluating this capability is MedCalc-Bench, a large-scale dataset constructed using LLM-based feature extraction and rule-based aggregation.
